title: It's time to stop.
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BeekeErySig
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Kdxi4iW_X4

Lol, and it's ok for Lux, to have no items and one shot? Fuck off. It's also, almost, the same combo, Q-E-R Lux one shot combo. Zoe: E-Q-Q-R-W one shot combo. But Zoe's combo is harder to hit. 
This video proves it.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PTJZljf6L0w

http://na.op.gg/champion/zoe/statistics/mid
https://champion.gg/champion/Zoe/Middle?
http://matchup.gg/champion/Zoe/MID/
https://u.gg/lol/champions/zoe/build/?region=world&queueType=ranked_solo_5x5&patch=8_13&rank=platinum_plus&role=middle

Stop it Riot. It's all scream and nonsense. If Zoe can't one shot, so shouldn't t Lux and most of the champions in the videos.
Zoe isn't broken and never will, everyone has no idea, what the fuck they are talking about.

replies.body: But you literally have a zoe one shotting in one of your videos....?

> [{quoted}](name=Madsin25,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MEFiB9al,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-12T15:30:18.629+0000)
>
> But you literally have a zoe one shotting in one of your videos....?

Yes, because she can. I know she can, I won't deny that. But, I'm also making the point that Lux can and many others can.

Lux can, one shot earlier, and easier than Zoe. I know that as well cause I play both.
